articles.content:
After Prabhas, next Kartik Aryan
Om Raut made his directorial debut with the historic drama Tanhaji , starring Ajay Devgn, Saif Ali Khan, and Kajol, and the movie was a blockbuster at the box office… [+995 chars]

articles.title: Newlywed Natasha Dalal slays in a red dress as she steps out for dinner sans hubby Varun Dhawan; PHOTOS - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Varun Dhawan's wife Natasha Dalal was snapped by the paparazzi last night after she headed out for dinner with her girl gang. Natasha rocked a gorgeous silky dress for a night with her girls.
